name: Mark K Hall
text: Do business with them on a near daily basis. Always knowledge and courteous. Can’t recommend anyone better.

name: Jeremy Rogers
text:
Great pit fair gravel and aggregate pricing , I use them weekly . Smooth operation.
A lot of Birmingham history on the Wade property , not open to the public unfortunately...

name: Earnest Gann
text: It said post this and let others know what to expect, well, expect a train between the front scales and the load out yard

name: jack scott
text: Very friendly and easy to get material delivered.

name: Joe Simmons
text: Good people good product

name: Brandon McCray
text: Shot a music video here.

name: Drew Edmondson
text: Good place to work

name: Drew Edmondson
text: Where I work

name: George Barnett
text:
Fair, responsive, informative.
Their drivers are GREAT and helpful as well.
Great pricing and very helpful when picking correct product.

name: Alabama Fish & Pond
text:
BEWARE - WE URGE YOU TO AVOID THIS COMPANY - We ordered 13 TONS of regular sized gravel for a landscaping project.

Their Driver dumped 5"-6" large rocks.  When we sent them these pictures and asked them to make it right they rudely REFUSED.

They said they have a 10% error margin for size!  REALLY?  2-1/2" increased to 5-6" is their error margin?

They couldn't care less that they have lost a repeat customer's business.  We would say avoid them like the plague since they do business this way.

name: Mark Green
text: Friendly and helpful people, great prices and easy to work with.

name: DK Bright
text: I hear they don't pay their employees very well and only one weeks vacation.   You would think a Fortune 500 company would have better compensation for their employees.

name: Allen Rhodes
text: Terrible when they do road construction. Mccartney and the others don't hold up traffic near as long as fulcan . When paving boiling springs road the literally make you wait 15 minutes in some of the worst traffic caused them I've ever seen.

name: Earnest Gann
text:
Great quality
Great service
Friendly people

name: NOT SURE
text: Lime stone.

name: Jeremy Stewart
text: Fabulous people with fabulous products!!!! If you need some rock and don’t wanna feel like you just took a big ole..., call Madison Materials. Been using their products for 8 years and couldn’t be happier getting it anywhere else! Give them a call and you’ll be glad you did!

name: Neal Guthrie
text: Sent out the wrong product and wouldn’t do anything to fix it or make it right.

name: Jamie Pouliot
text: I live about a mile from this place and have had several loads of material brought to my house ... my driveway is 1200 feet long and it takes a beating during certain times of the year... I have called them direct and get service the same day and I request a certain few drivers that are professional drivers and experts when it comes to spreading out the crushed rock... when these drivers are done dumping the load of rock you do not need to rake out any lumps or any high spots no work necessary... finished and probably looks better and more even than if I spent days on it myself... the woman who takes my order is very nice and now she knows exactly what I need... I didn't know what size I needed at first and the driver knew exactly what it was I needed . they are professionals do their job well... I always say they dont tell you how to do your job please let them do theirs they are good at it trust me

name: Matthew Risner
text: BEWARE !!!!!!! Please if you do not know that much about crush and run 3/4 crush and run should have a little over half of 3/4 inch rocks in it and then some smaller crushed gravel. I ordered 3 loads to do my driveway at the time I was busy and looking back and asked around I found that I wouldn't have to have but half the amount because they delivered SCRAP SMALL PEBBLES.  The last load I just received was actual the real stuff.  I called and they refused to do anything about it !! Please make sure it's over half 3/4 inch rocks!!! THEY COULD HAVE EASLY ASKED FOR PICTURES OR SENT SOMEONE OUT !!!! I FEEL RIPPED OFF!

name: Michael Johnston
text: Never been close on Saturday have no postings of hours of operation so the public won't know when they are open and when they are closed so Post hours of operation near front gate so the public and no when they pass by the hours of operation for the ones that don't know the area other than that looks like a good clean facility good equipment also heard it was a good place to work work long hours but make good money
